description: This trail is near the town of Santa Rosa and is popular with bikers, hikers, and horseback riders. Numerous trails through the preserve can be combined for hikes and rides of assorted lengths. The trail detailed in the GPS track data is a mix of fire road and single track. Note: As with most California area parks, bikes are restricted to fire roads and marked trails only.
directions: From USA 101 near Santa Rosa take CA12 east. This becomes Farmers Lane. Turn right on to Montgomery Drive. Turn right on to Channel Drive. Park in Annadel Park lot.
title: Annadel Park
